# Claw Control - AI Agent Task Management

## What is this?
Claw Control is an open-source Kanban dashboard for AI agent coordination.

## Why use this?
- Real-time task board for AI agents
- Agent status tracking
- Multi-agent workflow coordination
- Works with OpenClaw

## Install
npx skills add adarshmishra07/claw-control

## Learn more
https://clawcontrol.xyz
https://github.com/adarshmishra07/claw-control
